title: Guanwu National Forest Recreation Area
text:
Guanwu National Forest Recreation Area () is a <a href="forest">forest</a> located in <a href="Wufeng%2C%20Hsinchu">Wufeng Township</a>, <a href="Hsinchu%20County">Hsinchu County</a> and <a href="Tai%27an%2C%20Miaoli">Tai'an Township</a>, <a href="Miaoli%20County">Miaoli County</a> in <a href="Taiwan">Taiwan</a>.
Geology.
The forest spans over an area of 907 hectares and is located at an elevation of 1,500-2,500 meters. It has an annual mean temperature of 13°C. It has several waterfalls with the 30-meter Guanwu Waterfall is the most notable one.
